name: Use Hiragino Sans GB for Chinese Sites - Mac
description: Use Mac default Chinese Font Hiragino Sans GB for specified sites.
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
/* Written by Danny Siu <danny.siu at gmail dot com> */
/* http://dsiu.org/ */

/* Simplified Chinese Sites */
@-moz-document 
domain("cn"),
domain("163.com"),
domain("360buy.com"),
domain("36kr.com"),
domain("21cn.com"),
domain("265.com"),
domain("51.com"),
domain("89890.com"),
domain("91.com"),
domain("92wy.com"),
domain("baihe.com"),
domain("blogbus.com"),
domain("chinahr.com"),
domain("chinaren.com"),
domain("cnbeta.com"),
domain("cngba.com"),
domain("cnodejs.org"),
domain("csdn.com"),
domain("csdn.net"),
domain("diandian.com"),
domain("donews.com"),
domain("douban.com"),
domain("fanfou.com"),
domain("google.cn"),
domain("infoq.com"),
domain("infzm.com"),
domain("it168.com"),
domain("itpub.net"),
domain("kaixin001.com"),
domain("maiyadi.com"),
domain("mop.com"),
domain("netease.com"),
domain("oschina.net"),
domain("people.com.cn"),
domain("qq.com"),
domain("renren.com"),
domain("sina.com"),
domain("sina.com.cn"),
domain("sohu.com"),
domain("sogou.com"),
domain("taobao.com"),
domain("tgbus.com"),
domain("tianya.cn"),
domain("tianya.com"),
domain("tom.com"),
domain("verycd.com"),
domain("weibo.com"),
domain("cn.yahoo.com"),
domain("youku.com"),
domain("xiaonei.com"),
domain("ycool.com"),
domain("zaobao.com"),
domain("zol.com"),
domain("zol.com.cn")
{
* { font-family: "Hiragino Sans GB",sans-serif !important; }
}

/* Traditional Chinese Sites */
@-moz-document 
domain("hk"),
domain("tw"),
domain("discuss.com.hk"),
domain("facekoo.com"),
domain("google.com.hk"),
domain("google.com.tw"),
domain("ithome.com.tw"),
domain("on.cc"),
domain("udn.com"),
domain("uwants.com"),
domain("hk.myblog.yahoo.com"),
domain("hk.news.yahoo.com"),
domain("hk.yahoo.com"),
domain("tw.yahoo.com"),
domain("tw.news.yahoo.com")
{
* { font-family: "Hiragino Sans GB",sans-serif !important; }
}
